description:
Damian is half Hispanic and half Vietnamese. I am aware the site needs to mix things up, so I thought his mix would be nice to add to the site.
Damian is proudly a self-professed stoner, as it is now legal for him smoke weed. He likes girls with a little meat on them- no waif-thin skinny girls for him!
I kind of get the feeling he grew up in a rough area, but now seems to have balance in his life. He was sent to me via a scout, and he didn't think the whole porn thing was legit. So in a way, he didn't even think he would be doing a jerk-off video at all. He kept waiting for the scam to happen.
If you like super hung guys, he's not gonna be in your favorites. He's packing what you might stereotypically expect from his heritage. He was a also a little nervous during the shoot, and watched a lot of the video. I got him a couple times to play to the audience, but overall, he's watching the porn.
Well, maybe he was not so much nervous. Damian says he just doesn't watch much porn, and I think it was new for him. He also says he doesn't jack-off much either, as he always has girls available. When the guys say that, it usually worries me, as they haven't really mastered their cock. Damian did fine, and clearly knew how to get himself off.
For his cumshot, he totally got in the zone. Geeeeez, he shoots a giant load!
title: Damian - Solo
